channel.title: Hitpoint Problem Please Help
channel.description: It seems my server wont save the hitpoints. When I log in and I eat something and gain full health 135. Than when I log out with 135 health I log back into the game with 10 how can I fix this? Please help

item.description:
@acesoldier wrote:

It seems my server wont save the hitpoints. When I log in and I eat something and gain full health 135. Than when I log out with 135 health I log back into the game with 10 how can I fix this? Please help
